de.sub.goobi.forms

Class CalendarForm.IssueOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sub.goobi.forms.CalendarForm.IssueOption
  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarForm

    public static class CalendarForm.IssueOption
extends Object
    The class IssuesOption represents the option that an Issue may have been issued on a certain day in history.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String colour
      The field colour holds the colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue.
      protected org.joda.time.LocalDate date
      The field date holds the date of this possible issue in the course of time.
      protected Issue issue
      The field issue holds the issue this that this possible issue would be of.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IssueOption(CalendarForm.IssueController controller, org.joda.time.LocalDate date)
      Constructor for an IssueOption.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getColour()
      The function getColour() returns a colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue as read-only property “colour”.
      String getIssue()
      The function getIssue() returns the issue’s name as read-only property “issue”.
      boolean getSelected()
      The function getSelected() returns whether the issue appeared on the given date as read-only property “selected”, taking into consideration the daysOfWeek of regular appearance, the Set of exclusions and the Set of additions.
      void selectClick()
      The method selectClick() is executed if the user clicks an issue option in unselected state.
      void unselectClick()
      The method unselectClick() is executed if the user clicks an issue option in selected state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • colour

        The field colour holds the colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue.

      • date

        protected final org.joda.time.LocalDate date
        The field date holds the date of this possible issue in the course of time.

        protected final Issue issue
        The field issue holds the issue this that this possible issue would be of.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IssueOption

        public IssueOption(CalendarForm.IssueController controller,
                   org.joda.time.LocalDate date)
        Constructor for an IssueOption.
        Parameters:
        controller - IssueController class for that issue
        date - date of the issue option

    • Method Detail

      • getColour

        public String getColour()
        The function getColour() returns a colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue as read-only property “colour”.
        Returns:
        the HTML colour code of the issue

      • getIssue

        public String getIssue()
        The function getIssue() returns the issue’s name as read-only property “issue”.
        Returns:
        the issue’s name

      • getSelected

        public boolean getSelected()
        The function getSelected() returns whether the issue appeared on the given date as read-only property “selected”, taking into consideration the daysOfWeek of regular appearance, the Set of exclusions and the Set of additions.
        Returns:
        whether the issue appeared that day

      • selectClick

        public void selectClick()
        The method selectClick() is executed if the user clicks an issue option in unselected state. If this is an exception, the exception will be removed. Otherwise, an additional issue will be added.

      • unselectClick

        public void unselectClick()
        The method unselectClick() is executed if the user clicks an issue option in selected state. If this is regular appearance of that issue, an exception will be added. Otherwise, the additional issue will be removed.
